page.title: 13LEISURE & RECREATION
page.content: There are many outdoor activities in which you can participate within our area such as walks or swimming in the sea. Dornoch has lots of amenities for sports. It has two good golf courses, tennis court, a bowling green, squash court and a sandy beach. In Dornoch most people have a reasonable sized garden in which they grow flowers and vegetables which as a pastime it is popular. Many people enjoy television and quite a few have videos. Bingo is played in the Golf Club by the adults. Dornoch has its own library which is widely supported by all ages. Discos are held fairly often in the Social Club, the Golf Club and the school. They are usually very popular with the age group eleven to fifteen. A popular recreational activity is horse riding and many young people keep horses in fields dotted throughout the area.
